Name: Jetpack Boost
Description: Launches the player upward with a burst of jet propulsion.

Name: Time Freeze
Description: Freezes time for all enemies while the player can move freely.

Name: Shadow Step
Description: Quickly teleport behind the nearest enemy in sight.

Name: Ground Slam
Description: Slam the ground to deal area damage and knockback.

Name: Hologram Decoy
Description: Deploys a holographic clone to distract enemies.
